item.title: PLEASE LOOK i need help whit npc talking! PLEASE LOOK
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

OK so how can i make if i talk to a npc and he give 10m like this: (it works)

f(NPCID == 243 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 10000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000000); sendFrame200(4883, 243); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(243).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("Here take this 10 million, Enjoy you stay!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(243, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true;

But how can i make it that he canâ€™t give 10 million again. SO if you talk to him for a second time he say this:

if(NPCID == 243 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ actionInterval = 10000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sendFrame200(4883, 243); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(243).replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("I'm to busy right now!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(243, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true;

plz help

Read full topic
